text: T4 on the Beach is a one-day yearly music event that occurs in Weston-super- Mare in June or July. It began in 2003 as Pop Beach in Great Yarmouth, changing in 2005 to its current name and location. The event is broadcast live on Channel 4 in the United Kingdom. == Other websites== * Category:2003 establishments in England Category:Channel 4 television programmes Category:Music festivals in England Category:Norfolk Category:Somerset
title: T4 on the Beach
